Name: Sylvan Harmonist
Story Background: Born in the heart of the ancient forest, the Sylvan Harmonist is a protector of nature and a conduit for its untamed energies.
Ability: When Sylvan Harmonist enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. If you do, shuffle your library.
Appearance Description: A tall figure cloaked in woven leaves and adorned with growing vines, holding a staff carved from an ancient oak. The air around them hums with natural energy.
